ai-iti65:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti65:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of good conduct.
ai-iti65:2.3_0: Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-iti65:2.4_0: These are the three kinds of good conduct.”
ai-iti65:3.4_0: than that is hard to comprehend.
ai-iti65:4.3_0: When their body breaks up, that wise person
ai-iti65:4.4_0: they’re reborn in a heavenly realm.”
ai-iti65:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
